lower.label: Lower bound
lower.tooltip: Indefinite integration with result given with input replacing variable if upper not given. If upper: calculate definite integral.

curve.label: Curve
curve.tooltip: A curve in space, which is defined by parametric functions for the coordinates, a parameter and the lower and upper bounds for the parameter value

vars.label: Variables
vars.tooltip: List of variables, separate with a comma

func.label: Function
func.tooltip: Compute the Mellin transform F(s) of f(x)
